user.title: SmartThings Find
user.description:
Enter Cookie header. (Paste new Cookie when session expires)

1) Login at https://smartthingsfind.samsung.com
2) DevTools(F12) → Network
3) Open chkLogin.do (refresh if needed)
4) Copy Request Headers → Cookie: line
5) Paste below

error.invalid_auth: Authentication failed. Please verify the Cookie header.

init.title: Options
init.description:
Active / Passive info

- Passive: Reads only the last location reported to the server (lower battery impact)
- Active: Sends a location update request before reading (fresher location, higher battery impact)

SmartTags and other devices are configured separately due to different behavior and battery impact.
